title: Tanezrouft Basin
description: In central Algeria, just north of the Tropic of Cancer and about 1200 kilometers (750 miles) south of the Algiers metropolis, lies a land as desolate as it is beautiful.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
